workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.2662961840364813 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.031318688627841484 --weight-decay 0.0008100464656141848 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 5.1065119459898855e-05 --lr-period-updates 6747.608530727664 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.16811375675615137 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
